job.title: Mobile Developer - C#, Xamarin, JavaScript
job.description: If you are a Mobile Developer with experience, please read on! Location: Remote Full Time/Direct Hire Salary: DOE What You Will Be Doing Responsible for leading development, design, and maintenance. Develop and maintain application, its shared libraries, and related internal products and tools Estimate work efforts at multiple levels of the project. Work in an Agile environment where you inspect, adapt, and most importantly meet commitments. Developing exciting, compelling, and engaging applications. What You Need for this Position Android Development / iOS Development C# & Xamarin JavaScript, React REST / SOAP / HTTP Nice To Have (not Required) JSON / XML Git / Gitflow PWAs What's In It for You Employee Health Insurance: Dental, Vision Awesome Work Life Balance Great PTO plan So, if you are a Mobile Developer with experience, please apply today or email your resume to Stephanie.Lilley@cybercoders.com! Email Your Resume In Word To Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also: Stephanie.Lilley@CyberCoders.com Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SL9-1647439 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.*** Stephanie Lilley - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
